entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: File.AppendAllBytes #84532
  • Use primitive type IUtf8SpanFormattable implementations #84527
  • Fold PathString aspnet pattern #84525
    Future
  • The Jit will sometimes drop side-effecting unused addresses #84522
    8.0.0
  • PGO: redundant Tier0-instr promotions #84517
    8.0.0
  • browser-wasm - WasmApp.targets No way to specify App Base Path #84516
  • Cache `EndPoint.ToString()` #84515
  • Fixed array in structures shows incorrect values in VS debugger #84514
  • Facing errors while mocking Get() in ManagementObjectSearcher #84513
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64 LoadVector64 and LoadVector128 for 2,3 and 4 variants #84510
  • Enhance verify-so.sh to handle cross-build scenarios #84508

Closed

  • ARM64: Optimize pair of "ldr reg, [reg]" to ldp #35132
    Future
  • Test Failure tracing\\eventpipe\\enabledisable\\enabledisable\\enabledisable.cmd #83359
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Inline static initialization checks in codegen #80954
    8.0.0
  • EventCounters unexpectedly stop reporting data when first of two listeners disconnects #61353
    8.0.0
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/rundownvalidation/rundownvalidation/rundownvalidation.sh #81323
    8.0.0
  • Test failure profiler/multiple/multiple/multiple.sh #81324
    8.0.0
  • Test failure profiler\\gc\\gcbasic\\gcbasic.cmd #75821
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add SIMD to LowerCallMemcmp #84530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve alias analysis for invariant indirs #84529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use `gtNewIndir` in more places #84528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix Kernel32.GetSystemTimes usage on Windows #84526
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Improve SequenceEqual for constant lengths unrolling #84524
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix some issues with null check handling #84523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Split superpmi-diffs pipeline runs #84521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize IEnumerable<T>.Sum where possible #84519
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Add detailed message for AmbiguousMatchException and AmbiguousInvocationException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Update implementation of optUpdateLoopsBeforeRemoveBlock #84511
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Array marshalling tests for ComInterfaceGenerator #84509
    area-Interop-coreclr

Merged

  • NativeAOT: Partially expand static initialization #83911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Perform ldr to ldp peephole optimization #84399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Disable enabledisable test for GCStress #84506
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [mono] [RISC-V] re-implement floating point arithmetic without r4fp #84470
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Write linker script for lld to enable gc-sections #84493
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reenable VectorLookup tests for mono. #84330
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListeners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #84322
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Apply the TimeProvider design feedback #84501
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Add support to inline the field access of primitive types marked with TLS #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating the JIT to support Narrow, WidenLower, and WidenUpper for Vector512 #84498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Improve allocations in ReflectionXmlSerializationWriter when serializing primitive types #84474
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Avx512 arithmetic #84429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add SPMI benchmarks run collections for tiered and tiered pgo #84483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: scalable profile counter mode #84427
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Build on CBL-mariner host with rootfs #84148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Testmerging jit64 #83151
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure loops respect dominators #84458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    area-Threading-mono
  • [wasm-mt] A version of LowLevelLifoSemaphore that uses callbacks on the browser #84491
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, TimeOnly, TimeSpan, Char, Rune #84469
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Mark tasks projects as non-source projects #84488
    area-Infrastructure
  • Added the ability to specify a Spin Count Unit via a GC Configuration to release/7.0 #84495
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Memory Diagnostics: GC Bookkeeping #84454
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-GC-coreclr
  • Obsolete most of the remaining legacy serialization APIs #84383
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
